title: The Miraculous Mellops 2. Part 1
creator_credit: Karl Zwicky, Posie Graeme-Evans, Film Australia and Millenium Pictures
brief_description: In this series of episodes, the Mellops family discover WOOPS or Windows of Opportunity; the only known way to travel faster than light. The alien grubs and their disgusting habits are planning to visit earth and Dump manages to steal the WOOP for his own purposes but runs into a few pointy obstacles. The adventures of the Mellops, Dumps and Grubs, takes us out of the plant nursery into outer space.
